answers.answer: Hi,The pains which you’re suffering can have many causes like they could be neuropathic pains which can occur in a glove & stocking fashion involving the hands & feet. One of the important reasons for the same is diabetes which needs to be ruled out by doing a blood sugar test. They can be simply be muscular pains which can occur due to exertion. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: i am having stretchy pain in my hands (arms specifically) and feet (soles)..what could be the cause ?
title: stretchy pain
